body.p: This tab provides information on the relation between the lemmata.
partOf a lemma is a part of another lemma.
contains/is composed of a relation between a compositum and its components.

Referencing / referencedBy in cases of lemmas, that have been proven to be wrong () a relations is set to the correct lemma by "referencing". In the correct lemma () the relation to the wrong lemmata will be defined through "referenced by".
rootOf a relation between a lemma and its root.
successor / predecessor correlation between the Egyptian and Demotic word lists.
is cross-reference to this option is offered but is not relevant at the moment.
Enter the Name of the related object here.
Search for a text or an object in the corpora of your current project, so that you do not have to enter it manually.
Click it to add more relations.
This removes a relation from the Object.
